message: Let's split it 60-40, a fair start!
I'll give you a small share, but I want a bigger cut!
Let's split it 50-50, no more negotiations!
You're not getting 50/50, I'm the one who makes the moves!
You're getting too greedy, let's meet in the middle!
You're getting close to giving up, I'll give you a little more!
You're really squeezing me, but I'll give you a chance to reconsider!
You're running out of time, I'm not getting any softer!
I'm not giving up yet, let's make a final push!
You're almost out of time, this is my last offer!
I'm not giving up, I'll make one last stand!
It's my last chance, take it or leave it!
